import "../css/Pages.css"; import "../css/Bootstrap.css"; import { BiTrash, BiArrowBack, BiCartAlt } from "react-icons/bi"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import addToCart from "../actions/cartAction.js"; function Basket(props) { const productId = props.match.params.Id; const qty = props.location.search ? Number(props.location.search.split("=")[1]) : 1; const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { if (productId) { dispatchEvent(addToCart(productId, qty)); } }, []); return (
{cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Sepetiniz boş

) : ( cartItems.map((item) => (

{item.name} {item.name} {item.name} {item.name} Sepetten çıkar
)) )}
